com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Class SpenObjectLine.Properties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectLine.Properties
  • Enclosing class:
    SpenObjectLine

    public static class SpenObjectLine.Properties
extends Object
    Properties Class.
    This is a utility class for making a candidate path of SpenObjectLine.
    The path of SpenObjectLine depends on its connector position and connected shape. In this reason, this class helps make a candidate path about SpenObjectLine.setConnectorPosition(int, PointF), SpenObjectLine.moveControlPoint(int, PointF), SpenObjectLine.connect(int, SpenObjectShapeBase, int).
    Since:
    4.0.0
    See Also:
    SpenObjectLine.getProperties(), SpenObjectLine.makePath(Properties)

    • Method Detail

      • setBeginConnector

        public void setBeginConnector(PointF point,
                     RectF connectedShapeRect,
                     float connectedShapeDegree)
        Set a begin connector position.
        Set a begin connector position and connected info.
        Parameters:
        point - The new begin connector position.
        connectedShapeRect - The connected shape rect. If there is no connected shape, pass null.
        connectedShapeDegree - The connected shape rotation degree.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the line point is null.

      • setEndConnector

        public void setEndConnector(PointF point,
                   RectF connectedShapeRect,
                   float connectedShapeDegree)
        Set a end connector position.
        Set a end connector position and connected info.
        Parameters:
        point - The new end connector position.
        connectedShapeRect - The connected shape rect. If there is no connected shape, pass null.
        connectedShapeDegree - The connected shape rotation degree.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the line point is null.

      • setControlPoint

        public void setControlPoint(int index,
                   PointF point)
        Set a control point position.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of control point.
        point - The new position of control point.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if the index is a negative value, or if it is greater than the number of control points of current line.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the point is null.

      • setRect

        public void setRect(RectF rect)
        Set the specified rectangle for the line.
        Use this method to resize and move the line.
        Parameters:
        rect - The rectangle of region.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the rect is null.
